roleset.name: natural disaster: widespread outbreak of disease

example.name: epidemic-n: args 1, 2
example.text: Anderson said he was still predicting the Bovine Spongiform Encephalopathy (BSE) epidemic in cows would be ``at an extremely low level by 2001.''

roleset.note: EPIDEMIC-N NOTES: Added by Julia in a Natural Disaster roleset endeavor. (from epidemic.01-n)
The "VSP" function tags on 'death/injury toll' and 'damages/cost' correspond to the RED cause relation.
